Package com.hissain.jscipy.signal.fft

Class Periodogram

java.lang.Object
com.hissain.jscipy.signal.fft.Periodogram
public class Periodogram extends Object
Implementation of Periodogram for Power Spectral Density estimation. Matches scipy.signal.periodogram behavior with 'density' scaling.

      public Periodogram()

  • Method Details

    • periodogram

      public Periodogram.PeriodogramResult periodogram(double[] x, double fs)
      Computes the periodogram of a signal with default parameters. Uses Hann window, nfft = signal length, and constant detrending.
      Parameters:
      x - The input signal.
      fs - The sampling frequency in Hz.
      Returns:
      PeriodogramResult containing frequencies and PSD.

    • periodogram

      public Periodogram.PeriodogramResult periodogram(double[] x, double fs, double[] window, int nfft, DetrendType detrend)
      Computes the periodogram of a signal. Matches scipy.signal.periodogram with scaling='density'.
      Parameters:
      x - The input signal.
      fs - The sampling frequency in Hz.
      window - The window function to apply. If null, uses Hann window.
      nfft - The FFT size. If <= 0, uses signal length.
      detrend - Detrending type to apply before windowing. Null for none.
      Returns:
      PeriodogramResult containing frequencies and PSD.
